import{initializeApp}from"firebase/app";import{getAuth,GoogleAuthProvider}from"firebase/auth";import{getFirestore}from"firebase/firestore";var firebaseConfig={apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_API_KEY,authDomain:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN,projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID,storageBucket:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET,messagingSenderId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_SENDER_ID,appId:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_APP_ID};var app=initializeApp(firebaseConfig);var auth=getAuth(app);// const provider = new GoogleAuthProvider();
var db=getFirestore(app);export{auth,db};
